original_description:
This is an automated pull request to sync changes between the public and private repos.
Our bot will merge this pull request automatically.
To preserve continuity across repos, _do not squash_ this pull request.
raw_analysis:
### Summary
- Updated GitHub Actions: `actions/labeler@v4` to `v5`, `actions/create-github-app-token@v1` to `v2`, and `actions/go-dependency-submission@v1` to `v2`.
- Fixed typo in GitHub Advanced Security billing documentation ("need pay" â†’ "need to pay").
- Simplified billing UI instructions: removed redundant scrolling step in product usage view.
- Restructured billing overview page: removed metered usage graph, repositioned repository/organization usage cards, and updated prepaid credits/promotions sections.
- Enhanced Copilot metrics documentation: added new features (Copilot Edits, Spaces, Spark), clarified retention, and noted IDE telemetry limitations.
- Added Azure Blob Storage virtual network firewall rules for GitHub Enterprise Importer migrations.

### Title
Update docs: Billing UI, Copilot metrics, Actions versions, and GEI firewall rules
